intro: Panama is considered an International Business Centre, thanks to Panamanian legislation and regulations which have always been designed to promote operations in a simple and expeditious fashion, and a fiscal policy based on the principle of territoriality, by virtue of which tax is only levied on the income generated by activities conducted within and/or from the territory of the Republic of Panama.HIGHLIGHTS OF THE REPUBLIC OF PANAMASOCIAL AND ECONOMIC INDICATORSRelated documents (PDF): For the complete list of characteristics, uses and benefits of this jurisdiction, click here.
